original_title: But Mom! It Is the End of the World
overview: When the button is pushed causing the world to end in a matter of hours, a teenage girl struggles to come to terms with her sexuality. The relationship between mother and daughter is pushed to the limit during the final hours they spend together. Will she be able to show her true colors to the world before it comes crashing down in front of her?
title: But Mom! It Is the End of the World
